about_the_game:
Amazing collection of 28 lures from Sakura ®! Expand your inventory with different types of lures - spinnerbaits, poppers, wobblers, jigs and more!

28 new 3D models of real-life Sakura® lures in many color variations and sizes (about 60 new items in the store in total).

Lures included in Sakura Lures DLC:

  • Sakura® Dumbbell Popper,
  • Sakura® Slider Sepia Madai Jig,
  • Sakura® Sepia Madai Jig,
  • Sakura® S-Shiner 145S,
  • Sakura® Speed Minnow 125S-150S,
  • Sakura® Jackax Shad Rigged,
  • Sakura® Slit Finesse,
  • Sakura® Tex'Shad,
  • Sakura® Soukouss Blade,
  • Sakura® SCB Crank 100,
  • Sakura® Barbagrub,
  • Sakura® Bellamy Swim Jig,
  • Sakura® Bomba Crank 60F-70F,
  • Sakura® Cajun Double Indiana,
  • Sakura® Cajun Double Willow,
  • Sakura® Cajun Single Indiana,
  • Sakura® Cajun Chatterbait,
  • Sakura® Croaker Crank 55F,
  • Sakura® Gobygo,
  • Sakura® Micro Soukouss Blade 30S-35S,
  • Sakura® Monarc,
  • Sakura® Monarc Micro,
  • Sakura® Monsoon,
  • Sakura® Orion Jig,
  • Sakura® Phoxy Minnow,
  • Sakura® Pulsion TR,
  • Sakura® Roll Kicker,
  • Sakura® Rush Diver 90SP.
detailed_description:
Amazing collection of 28 lures from Sakura ®! Expand your inventory with different types of lures - spinnerbaits, poppers, wobblers, jigs and more!

28 new 3D models of real-life Sakura® lures in many color variations and sizes (about 60 new items in the store in total).

Lures included in Sakura Lures DLC:

  • Sakura® Dumbbell Popper,
  • Sakura® Slider Sepia Madai Jig,

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7/8/8.1/10 (x64 x86)
  • Processor: Core i5-2500 or equivalent
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 660 2GB VRAM or equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 12 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows 7/8/8.1/10 (x64 x86)
  • Processor: Core i5-4460 or equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 970 4GB VRAM or equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 12 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible
